thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Leonor

author: Leonor
title: Leonor
text: My husband and I were looking for a place to purchase the Classical Starts series for our children. Well, we found it and so much more. We are always on a tight budget but the price of the books couldn't be beat. At around $3 a book, we were able to slowly grow our library and have continued to do so for our own books. The only caveat is that the tracking on the orders does not always work and it can take up to two weeks to get the books, so if is an urgent need this may not be the best option.
